post.body: Teacher must have been really hard up for her latte.
Probably if you stole 5 bucks worth of candy from Wal-Mart they would just make you pay out of pocket and not strip you down.

Wow.Â Really you would just say, go ahead and violate my rights?Â So if a cop pulls you over and ask you to let him search you car, will you let him?Â Or a cop comes to your home and asks to search your home will you let him?Â I mean he has no reason to and no warrant.Â You would still let him because he is doing his job? I would wait for the warrant.Â Especially when I know I am innocent.Â I am just in shock by your statement.Â I cannot believe you do not value your rights. Maybe you were joking.Â Were you?
